ygData.subject: RE: Blocks of Crude Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, hey! Wazzzup! I live in the north part of town right up by Northglenn but I work down by the DTC. (Private mail me if you want to talk more). Well I think
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, hey! Wazzzup! I live in the north part of town right up by
Northglenn but I work down by the DTC. (Private mail me if you want to
talk more).

Well I think if your character learns smithing you can create stuff like
armor and weaponry with it. I got them off a bunch of Kobold Scouts in
Steamfront. I guess I should take advantage of it and learn the skill!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
